getPageWidth().Description: Gets the page width in PostScript points (1/72th of an inch).

getPageHeight().Description: Gets the page height in PostScript points (1/72th of an inch).

getContentRect().Description: Get the content rectangle in PostScript points (1/72th of an inch). This is the area that contains the page content and is relative to the page top left.

ClassDesc: This class represents meta-data that describes a PDF @B_android#graphics#pdf#PdfDocument#Page_E@.
